title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model library.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; install via pip, chat & embed in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & embed models as first-class LangChain components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails & scripting.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rust-based TUI chat client for Ollama with keyboard-centric UI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline coding copilots.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-camel
summary: Camel-AI adapter letting autonomous agents use Ollama models for role-playing tasks.

title: ollama-rag-qa-bot
summary: Minimal RAG question-answering demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated registry of custom GGUF models ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-qt-gui
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with conversation history and model manager.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial but widely-used Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/jmorganca/ollama-go.
